DOC.brief_summary: A clinical trial investigate influence CYP2C19 polymorphism pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamic characteristic omeprazole healthy Korean volunteer
DOC.criteria: 1 . Are able provide write informed consent . 2 . The subject healthy Korean age 20 45 year , inclusive . 3 . The subject weigh least 55 ( female , 55 ) 90 kg body mass index ( BMI ) range 18 25 kg/m2 1 . Subjects evidence history clinically significant pulmonary , cardiovascular , hepatic , endocrine , hematological , neurologic psychiatric disease . 2 . Subjects evidence gastrointestinal disease affect absorption drug . 3 . Subjects history drug abuse positive result urine drug screen drug abuse 4 . Subjects take prescribed medicine herbal medicine within 2 week first administration investigational product , nonprescribed medicine vitamin supplement within 1 week prior first administration investigational product ( condition satisfy , subject may eligible trial judged investigator . ) 5 . Subjects donate unit whole blood within 30 day participate clinical trial within 60 day prior first administration investigational product 6 . Subject history allergy omeprazole 7 . Subject continue proper contraception method study period . 8 . Subject positive urine HCG test result screening . ( case woman subject ) 9 . Subjects consume 21 unit alcohol per week ( 1 unit = 10 g pure alcohol ) unable abstain drinking PK/PD test period 10 . Subjects consume 10 cigarette per day unable abstain smoking PK/PD test period 11 . Subjects unable abstain grapefruit caffeine contain food 3 day prior first administration investigational product 12 . Subjects judge eligible study review clinical laboratory result reason investigator .
